text: None of the abstract concepts comes closer to fulfilled utopia than that of eternal peace.
author: Theodor Adorno

text: But, my dear sirs, when peace does come, you may call on me for any thing. Then will I share with you the last cracker, and watch with you to shield your homes and families against danger from every quarter.
author: William Tecumseh Sherman

text: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures peace is our gift to each other.
author: Elie Wiesel

text: Jesus Christ is a prince of peace. He told us to live in peace. He told us to love our enemies. He told us to do good to them that spitefully use us.
author: Pat Robertson

text: The most disadvantageous peace is better than the most just war.
author: Desiderius Erasmus
